elements.title: Geovation
elements.description: Backed by years of industry experience and a network that reaches far and wide, we are a community of location-data and proptech collaborators looking to make positive change happen.

elements.title: Rockstart
elements.description: We support startups by providing access to capital, market, community and expertise in four domains: emerging tech, energy, health, agrifood

elements.title: Urban Tech Program
elements.description: Accelerating the development of sustainable cities, in Copenhagen

elements.title: Free Electrons
elements.description: The Free Electrons program consists of 4 one week long modules held across the globe during the course of one year.

elements.title: running list of Climate Tech accelerators
elements.description: running list of Climate Tech accelerators

elements.title: Collaborative fund
elements.description: Thirteen people. Four funds. $300 million. 50+ invest­ments. Offices in SF & NYC. A leading source of capital for entrepreneurs pushing the world forward.

elements.title: Bentley iTwin Ventures
elements.description: Bentley iTwin Ventures will invest in ‘digital twin’ engineering, simulation and asset lifecycle management solutions serving public works and utilities, and industrial and natural resources.

elements.title: Engie New Ventures
elements.description: ENGIE New Ventures (ENV) was founded in 2014 as the corporate venture arm of the global energy provider ENGIE. Its €180 million fund is dedicated to making minority investment in technology startups that complement existing activities and resources to spur internal innovation within ENGIE.

elements.title: Pale Blue Dot
elements.description: Pale Blue Dot are a climate-tech venture fund investing in companies that reduce and reverse the effects of climate change and prepare for a new world. [News in Tech Crunch](https://techcrunch.com/2020/06/16/pale-blue-dot/)

elements.title: Lowercarbon Capital
elements.description: Chris & Crystal Sacca vc fund

elements.title: The Net Zero Home Programme
elements.description: Sustainable Ventures has partnered with Schneider Electric to pioneer a collaborative approach to achieve the Net Zero Home of the future. We are looking for leading start-ups and SMEs to work with us to turn this vision into a reality by collaborating to scale-up and achieve mass-market deployment of cutting-edge sustainability innovations.

elements.title: Tech Nation Net Zero
elements.description: Deadline 20.7.2020 - Looking for digital and hardware companies which operate across key sectors including electricity & energy, transport & mobility, agriculture, food systems, manufacturing and building technology.

elements.title: Systemiq
elements.description: SYSTEMIQ connects people, ideas, technologies and capital. As advisors, our insight helps to reshape policies and business strategies for rapid changes that are happening now, and shaping the decades ahead.

elements.title: Clean Growth Fund
elements.description: CGF recognises that innovation is required across all sectors to achieve net zero carbon emissions. We will invest in those companies with innovative solutions that serve a clean growth remit.

elements.title: Breakthrough Energy fund
elements.description: Bill Gates & Friends Breakthrough Energy fund , check the landscape section for ideas. Part of the money is [trickling down to Europe](http://europa.eu/rapid/press-release_IP-18-6125_en.htm)

elements.title: EnBW
elements.description: EnBW new ventures 100M fund

elements.title: Mayor of London energy efficiency fund (MEEF)
elements.description: Mayor of London energy efficiency fund (MEEF)

elements.title: wunder capital
elements.description: wunder capital Investment fund specialised in cleantech

elements.title: Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers
elements.description: Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers is regarded as one of the prominent VC in cleanTech, albeit going through some troubles, according to [Reuters](https://www.reuters.com/article/us-kleiner-doerr-venture/insight-how-cleantech-tarnished-kleiner-and-vc-star-john-doerr-idUSBRE90F0AD20130116)

elements.title: National grid fund
elements.description: National grid announced 250M fund link

elements.title: EIT InnoEnergy investment fund
elements.description: EIT InnoEnergy investment fund open fund (no deadline) by [InnoEnergy](http://www.innoenergy.com/about-innoenergy/) for sustainable energy across Europe supported by the European Institute of Innovation and Technology.

elements.title: BP Ventures
elements.description: BP Ventures setup in 2009 to identify and invest in private, high growth, game-changing technology companies, accelerating innovation across the entire energy spectrum

elements.title: national grid partners
elements.description: national grid partners is the utility industry’s first Silicon Valley-based VC & innovation firm. NGP invests in the potential of energy with a provocative vision to define a smarter and more renewable energy future.

elements.title: Energy Impact partners
elements.description: Energy Impact partners invest in companies shaping the energy landscape of the future

elements.title: Shell Ventures
elements.description: Shell Ventures targets startups and Small & Medium Enterprises (SMEs) from their early stages to their scale and growth phases. It makes minority investments that help to develop new technologies or disruptive business models in areas of strategic interest to Shell’s businesses.

elements.title: Clean Energy Venture Group
elements.description: Clean Energy Venture Group is an investment group with offices in Boston and New York which provides seed capital and management expertise to early stage clean energy companies. [In the news](https://news.crunchbase.com/news/bostons-clean-energy-ventures-raises-110m-for-its-first-fund/) Boston’s Clean Energy Ventures (CEV) has closed its first fund for $110 million.

elements.title: Piva
elements.description: Piva announced the launch of its inaugural $250 million fund with the mission of ushering in “a new era of industry and energy.” - [from Crunchbase](https://news.crunchbase.com/news/new-vc-firm-piva-closes-250m-fund-focused-on-energy-industry/)

elements.title: Green Angel Syndicate
elements.description: Green Angel Syndicate is an angel investment syndicate that focuses on companies in the energy, sustainable transport, water, smart cities and wider green economy sectors that, if not actually generating revenue, are on the cusp of doing so.

elements.title: Clean and cool
elements.description: Clean and cool not properly accelerator program, probably more a networking series of events

elements.title: EIC climate kic
elements.description: EIC climate kic the program on climate change run by the European Institute of Innovation & Technology **loads of startups**

elements.title: Sustainable accelerator
elements.description: Sustainable accelerator , London based, they also have a fund on seedrs. I think they back PowerVault

elements.title: Sustainable bridges
elements.description: Sustainable bridges / [Workspaces](https://www.sustainableworkspaces.co.uk/) it's the shared space where the accelerator operates (I think, will pay a visit soon)

elements.title: Valo Ventures
elements.description: We’re drawn to the line where creative entrepreneurs and emerging technologies intersect with social, economic, and environmental trends.

elements.title: Future Energy Ventures
elements.description: E.ON has merged the portfolio companies of its two investment vehicles under a new venture arm called Future Energy Ventures. From [Techcrunch, Oct 10th 2020](https://techcrunch.com/2020/10/08/german-energy-company-e-on-forms-eur250-million-venture-fund-focused-on-smart-grid-tech/)

elements.title: Powerhouse
elements.description: Powerhouse is an innovation firm and venture fund. We connect startups, corporations, and investors to build an energy and mobility system that is decarbonized, democratized, and digitized.

elements.description: Hawaii / California / Pacific accelerator Elemental last cohort started oct 18

elements.description: BCG DV In 2019-2020 we are piloting a new Program for Social Ventures. We are looking for motivated teams that want to build and grow their social initiative with our help over a three-month period at our Berlin office.

elements.description: Project Wren [backed by YCombinator](https://techcrunch.com/2019/07/07/y-combinator-backed-project-wren-is-aiming-to-make-carbon-offsets-more-consumer-friendly/), app to fund carbon negative projects, also has a carbon emission calculator

elements.title: Trine
elements.description: Trine , Sweden based, makes it easy for people to invest in solar energy in growing markets. Their mission is to give people a triple return on investment

elements.title: Switchr
elements.description: Switchr business model is to buy and optimize solar-plants with strict investment criteria where they see the greatest potential for increased performance.

elements.description: Abundance Investment creating ways for everyone to invest in green and social infrastructure

elements.description: Goclimateneutral invests in carbon negative projects by taking recurring payments from donors. Also has a [business footprint calculator](https://www.goclimateneutral.org/business/climate_reports/new)
